XPLText.text:
Child under 6 years old Stay and Eat Free

Honeymoon Bonus:
1X 50 minutes Spa treatment per person ( must be bonafide Honeymooners)


Honeymoon Bonus:
A bottle of Champagne on arrival ( must be bonafide Honeymooners)

Food & Beverage

  • All meals

  • Room service & private dining options

  • Non-alcoholic bottled beverages, including soft drinks, fruit juices, bottled water, tea and coffees.

  • Private beach picnics

Connectivity

  • Free high speed wireless internet in and around the main bure, bar, library, lounge area.

  • Mobile WIFI for in Bure access is available for an additional charge.

Complimentary Scheduled Activities

  • Weekly 3-hour excursion to the Blue Lagoon Caves (boat ride approx. 1-hour return) entry to the caves is by donation to the local village, payable by guests directly. This donation is subject to change.

  • Private beach picnics on choice of 11 beaches

  • Guided snorkeling trips (snorkeling gear provided)

  • Introductory Scuba session in pool

  • Visit to the neighboring Fijian Village

  • Cultural demonstrations

  • Sunday church service in the Fijian village

  • Guided nature walks

  • Weekly kava ceremony

  • Weekly manager’s cocktail party

  • Sailing, kayaks, stand up paddle boards & more

  • Guests wishing to arrange additional excursions outside of scheduled times (e.g. Blue Lagoon Caves) may incur additional charges.

  • All activities are subject to weather conditions

XPLText.text:
5 star luxury beachfront resort located in Yasawa Island Fiji...

Stay 5 Nights / Pay 4 Nights

maximum occupancy is 1x King Bed and 1 Divan Sofa 3A or 2A/2C. Each bure at Yasawa has a cool, open plan and luxury features throughout, from pillow top king beds with Frette bed covers to Bose wave music systems. The modern bathroom has a shower for two with a view of the ocean, while the expansive living area has plantation shutters and French doors to the sundeck outside.

XPLText.text:
5 star luxury beachfront resort located in Yasawa Island Fiji...

Stay 5 Nights / Pay 4 Nights

maximum occupancy is 1x King Bed and Living Area has 1 Divan sofa (can add 3x single beds)

3A or 2A/3C. Each bure at Yasawa has a cool, open plan and luxury features throughout, from pillow top king beds with Frette bed covers to Bose wave music systems. The modern bathroom has a shower for two with a view of the ocean, while the expansive living area has plantation shutters and French doors to the sundeck outside.

XPLText.text:
5 star luxury beachfront resort located in Yasawa Island Fiji...

Stay 5 Nights / Pay 4 Nights

1 room has 1x King Bed and 1 room has 1 King and 1 Single (can add 3x Single Beds)

8 pax. Perched on a rise overlooking the rest of the resort is a huge Family Bure with two separate bedrooms either side of a central living area. Its elevated outdoor deck provides magnificent views over the island and out to sea, and its name, Drodrolagi, is Fijian for rainbow.

XPLProduct.name: Honeymoon Bure Beachfront with Pool

XPLText.text: Yasawa Island Resort and Spa is an exclusive retreat on one of the most remote and unspoiled islands of Fiji. Just 18 luxury bungalows are hidden among the palms, each just a few steps from a pristine white beach. Swim in crystal clear waters, dive on vividly colored corals, connect with an ancient culture or indulge in Fiji’s first beachfront spa.

5 star luxury beachfront resort located in Yasawa Island Fiji...

Stay 5 Nights / Pay 4 Nights
An exclusive retreat on one of the most remote and unspoiled islands of Fiji - Yasawa. Just 18 luxury bungalows are hidden among the palms, each just a few steps from a perfect white beach.

Yasawa Island Resort and Spa is an exclusive retreat on one of the most remote and unspoiled islands of Fiji. Just 18 luxury bungalows are hidden among the palms, each just a few steps from a pristine white beach. Swim in crystal clear waters, dive on vividly colored corals, connect with an ancient culture or indulge in Fiji’s first beachfront spa. Whatever you choose to do at Yasawa, you’ll do it in complete seclusion.
Included in the Daily Rate:
All below activities included except Spa, Diving and Sport Fishing (subject to weather conditions)
Food & Beverage
* All Meals
* Bottled Water
* All non alcoholic Beverages including blended drinks, fruit cocktails & espresso
Non Motorised Sports
* Catamaran Sailing
* Windsurfing
* Kayaks (tandem & single)
* Body boards
Administrative Cultural Activities
* Free High speed wireless internet in Main Bure only
* Twice weekly village visits (by vehicle or boat)
* Weekly meke performance (traditional dancing)
* Weekly lovo (traditional feast)
* Weekly Kava Ceremony
* Weekly Church Choir Performance
* Weekly church visits (by vehicle or boat)
Water Based Activities and Other Activities
* Twice weekly 3 hour excursion to the Blue Lagoon Caves (boat ride approx 1 hour return)
* Private Beach picnics on choice of 11 beaches (boat ride approx 1 hour return)
* Snorkeling trips (snorkeling gear provided without charge)
* Introductory Scuba Pool Dive
* Welcome leis on arrival, Welcome drink on arrival, Bowl of fruit in bure on arrival
* Day & Night Tennis
* Guided Bush & Nature Walks
* Beach Volleyball
* Farewell drink
* Romantic Beach & Poolside dinners

Dining
Yasawa might be an island of isolation, but it’s also an island of plenty. All meals are included in the tariff at Yasawa, promising contemporary cuisine at every sitting and an emphasis on the succulent seafood caught daily in surrounding waters. Lobster plucked from the nearby reefs is a specialty. Dine at the restaurant, on the beach, in your bure or beneath the stars. The choice is yours.

Spa
Yasawa is home to Fiji’s first beachfront spa, just metres from the ocean’s edge on a sweep of soft white sand. The Baravi Spa draws its name from the Fijian word for beach and has been carefully constructed in a blend of traditional and contemporary styles, with an ocean-view massage deck perched over the sands in the open air, fanned by sea breezes. Our signature massage, the Baravi Rhythm, is performed by two synchronized therapists, working in time with the sound of the waves.

Activities/Facilities
Solitude. It’s our favorite pastime at Yasawa. So whatever you choose to do during your stay, you’ll be free to enjoy it in peace. Take a complimentary picnic on a deserted beach. Visit nearby villages to meet the local children or hear the church choir. Swim in the crystal waters of the famous Blue Lagoon or snorkel among corals and tropical fish. Do as much or as little as you choose. All activities at Yasawa are included in the tariff (except spa treatments, scuba diving and sportsfishing).

Bure – it’s Fijian for sanctuary. Yasawa is home to just 18 luxurious bures, each one just a few steps from the beach with a view of the ocean. Each air-conditioned bure is superbly fitted in contemporary Fijian style, with a thatched roof, plantation shutters, an expansive sun deck, an outdoor shower, a personal hammock and a private beach hut on the edge of the sands.

Beachfront Bure Suite - maximum occupancy is 1x King Bed and 1 Divan Sofa 3A or 2A/2C. Each bure at Yasawa has a cool, open plan and luxury features throughout, from pillow top king beds with Frette bed covers to Bose wave music systems. The modern bathroom has a shower for two with a view of the ocean, while the expansive living area has plantation shutters and French doors to the sundeck outside.

Beachfront Deluxe Bure - maximum occupancy is 1x King Bed and Living Area has 1 Divan sofa (can add 3x single beds) 3A or 2A/3C. Each bure at Yasawa has a cool, open plan and luxury features throughout, from pillow top king beds with Frette bed covers to Bose wave music systems. The modern bathroom has a shower for two with a view of the ocean, while the expansive living area has plantation shutters and French doors to the sundeck outside.

Beachfront 2 Bedroom Bure/Family Bure - 1 room has 1x King Bed and 1 room has 1 King and 1 Single (can add 3x Single Beds) 8 pax. Perched on a rise overlooking the rest of the resort is a huge Family Bure with two separate bedrooms either side of a central living area. Its elevated outdoor deck provides magnificent views over the island and out to sea, and its name, Drodrolagi, is Fijian for rainbow.

Honeymoon Suite - 1x King Bed and Living area 2 Divan Sofa 2A. The name says it all - Lomalagi, the Fijian word for heaven. Hidden from the rest of the resort at the end of a deserted white beach, the Honeymoon Bure Lomalagi is a private retreat with its own horizon pool overlooking the ocean. This is Yasawa at its best – absolute luxury and complete seclusion.
